title: C#/C++ Software Developer NEW!
full_description: Johnson Service Group has a long term contract for a Sr. Software Developer with strong C# /C++programming skills.This is a long term Contract position.Must have:Requirements:5+ years’ experience building SOA based software solutions5+ years’ Microsoft .Net overall programming experience5+ years of C++Experience developing Windows Desktop application (WinForms)Experience developing ASP.NET websites in both WebForms and MVCStrong knowledge of OOD, design patterns, software architecture, systems integration concepts and frameworksC# programming language .Net Framework 4.x, .Net Core 1.1 and 2.0HTML, JavaScript, CSS, JSON, XML, XSDMS SQL experience, preferable with MS SQL Server Express 2014/2016Accessing data by using Entity Framework (6.0, Code first) and Microsoft ADO.NETCreating and consuming Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services and securityStrong debugging and troubleshooting skillsBachelors Degree
